details.description:
Francine Bennett is a data scientist, andCEO and co-founder of Mastodon C -agile big data specialistsofferingopen source Hadoop-powered technology and the technical and analytical skills which help organisations to realise the potential of their data.
Before founding Mastodon C, Francine spent a number of years working on big data analysis for search engines, helping them to turn lots of data into even more money. She enjoys good coffee, running, sleeping as much as possible, and exploring large datasets.

@fhr

fran@mastodonc.com
